name: MCE SearchReplace Buttons
author: Anton Mashkovtsev

sections.description:
Adds SearchReplace editing controls to the visual content editor (TinyMCE).

A light weight plug-in that adds the Search and Replace editing controls from the full version of TinyMCE, optimized for WordPress. Note that this may not work in conjunction with other plug-ins that significantly alter or replace the visual editor’s default behavior.

Note that the SearchReplace controls are contained in the “kitchen sink” toolbar, toggled with the last button on the first row of controls.
sections.installation:
1. Install easily with the WordPress plugin control panel or manually download the plugin and upload the folder
    mce-searchreplace-buttons to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Show the toolbar in the editor by opening the “kitchen sink” (the last button in the first row)
